entry.title: 3M Cubitron 66527 - Cubitron Ii Cut-Off Wheel 66525 T1 6 in x .04 in x 7/8 in 7100098146
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Type 01 Straight Wheels
Price: 4.98

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Cut-Off Wheel, 66527, T1, black, 6 in x 0.05 in x 7/8 in (15.24 cm x 1.27 mm)

  • The 3M™ Cubitron™ II Cut-Off Wheels with 3M Precision Shaped Grain are engineered to cut faster than competitive ceramic products offering significant productivity gains
  • Metalworking professionals value its fast cutting action on heat-sensitive metals and its abrasive cutting wheel efficiency, yielding 2 to 7x more cuts than conventional cut-off wheels in many cases.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Cubitron
    Origin Country Poland
    Product Type Type 01 Straight Wheels

    Extra Product Information

  • Long-lasting without loss of performance, 3M™ Cubitron™ II Cut-Off Wheel efficiently cuts through even the toughest metal giving you better control while operating and over results
  • This rigid, reinforced resin-bonded cut-off wheel features 3M Precision S

    • Product Information

  • Outstanding cutting performance on both mild steel and ultra high strength steel
  • 3M™ Cubitron™ II cuts 30% faster and lasts 2x longer than conventional ceramic abrasives
  • Precision Shaped Grain (PSG) technology employs microreplication for extremely uniform abrasive
  • Triangular Precision Shaped Grains are super-sharp and cut exceptionally fast

    • Suggested Application

  • For grinding applications on stainless and mild steel

    • Product Information

entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Type 01 Straight Wheels
Price: 9.33

[shortdesc]
  • A chop saw is a light, low-horsepower portable machine
  • These machines can be easily moved, but the workpiece is carried to the machine
  • Chop saw cut-off wheels are designed specifically for this machine with finer grit, softer grades, and reinforcement layers that match the application.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Premier Red
    Arbor 1 Inch
    Diameter 12 Inch
    Grit 36
    Width 3/32 Inch
    Product Type Type 01 Straight Wheels

    Product Information

  • Advanced zirconia alumina/premium aluminum oxide abrasive grain blend for up to 20 percent increase in performance and life over our former zirconia alumina wheels, and 2-3 times the life of aluminum oxide wheels
  • High-performance bond designed for free cutting action while retaining excellent wheel life
  • Abrasive and bond combination designed for smooth, clean cut on low-horsepower machines
  • Exceptional performance to price ratio
  • highest productivity for lowest overall wheel cost
    		•
